title: StartupBlink
description: StartupBlink is a research platform focusing on the global innovation economy, with its assets including the Global Startup Ecosystem Map and the Global Startup Ecosystem Index. The platform's research encompasses startup ecosystems in 1,000 cities and 100 countries, including data on 150,000 startups across 12 industries and 100 sub-industries on its map. This research is supported by a network of 100+ government partners, as well as data partners such as Crunchbase and SEMrush.
